forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. West wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 3 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun glides across the sky, Downtown San Francisco basks in comfortable warmth, free from the fog that often cloaks the city. The hint of a gentle breeze caresses the air, making it a fine afternoon to take in the sights. With clear blue skies above, the landscape is a vibrant canvas; the golden glow of the afternoon light illuminates the iconic architecture, while the striking silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge beckons from a distance. As evening approaches, the chill sets in, whispering the promise of a cool night ahead.

Dress in layers, as the day may begin to cool down noticeably. A light sweater or jacket will serve well when the sun dips below the horizon. Consider meandering through local parks, perhaps finding a quiet bench to enjoy the soft sounds of the city transitioning into night. Strolling along the waterfront offers a picturesque backdrop, with the shimmering bay reflecting the fading sunlight. The conditions are inviting for a casual evening out—an ideal time to visit a cozy café or experience the gentle hustle of the local scene.
